Asia stocks see slim weekly gain, await US inflationAsian stocks were poised to eke out gains for the final full trading week of the year on Friday, while the dollar eyed a loss as investors look to 2024 as a year of steep U.S. rate cuts. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 02:10:20 GMT NWSITKLE6BLLDIKHO465PVDIVE https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-global-markets-2023-12-22/Tom Westbrook市场
US-China climate relations brace for US election, envoy changeThe U.S. and China have delivered big wins in climate diplomacy through the unique relationship of their chief climate envoys, but the two countries are bracing for change as the Chinese envoy retires and the U.S. readies for an election. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 01:04:14 GMT Q4RUDJ4TLNJSBB4GOPIV25ZCPQ https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/climate-energy/us-china-climate-relationships-brace-us-election-envoys-change-2023-12-22/Valerie Volcovici, David Stanway可持续发展缔约方大会第二十八届会议
Dollar sinks ahead of US inflation testThe dollar languished near a more than four-month low on Friday ahead of a reading on a key U.S. inflation gauge due later in the day, which will provide further clarity on how much room the Federal Reserve has to cut interest rates next year. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 00:33:31 GMT 4PXKOGRBURIUHM3D3X3ZUDFV5Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-sinks-ahead-us-inflation-test-2023-12-22/Rae Wee市场货币
US says it does not see any tonal change from China on TaiwanWashington does not see any change in China's tone on Taiwan, U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo told CNBC on Thursday when asked about media reports that Chinese President Xi Jinping told President Joe Biden that Beijing will reunify Taiwan with China. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 21:57:49 GMT QHA4YNAXGBP7BB2CULL27BJQPI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-says-it-does-not-see-any-tonal-change-china-taiwan-2023-12-21/Kanishka Singh世界
